name: Advanced Concepts in Voice
description: Advanced voice training to refine the skills and concepts developed thus far in DRM200Y1 and DRM300Y1, focusing on performance. Techniques of articulation, speech, and rhetoric are studied. Taken in conjunction with DRM403Y1: Advanced Performance: Mainstage and DRM411H1: Advanced Concepts in Movement.
department: Centre for Drama, Theatre and Performance Studies
prerequisites: Minimum CGPA of 2.7; DRM220Y1/DRM230Y1; DRM300Y1; acceptance into DRM403Y1 or permission of the Centre
